channel.title: [317] Logging In [317]
channel.description:
ok so ive portforwarded with uTorrent, I Have the no-ip running (But the face is blushing?) ive compiled+run'd
Nothing.....
Me (the Owner) cant logg in?
"No response from server Please try using a different world"
AMG? PLEASE HELP :)

item.title: [317] Logging In [317]
item.dc:creator: @x_blitz_x x blitz x
item.description:
@x_blitz_x wrote:

[quote=“ownpkscape, post:4, topic:254371”][quote author=Xizl_Halton_Xizl link=topic=336145.msg2612503#msg2612503 date=1230831173]
no i didnt cos ive only just put up… and ive followed a tut saying i need one, also i have run a 317 before and ive used no-ip DUC to run that

then im sorry can’t help u more, or just restart serv and try again =) if dont work then i have no idea
O_o
[/quote][/quote]
He said that.

Also, in your client class find the run method.
Then find something where it changes the integer returnCode so it’s not 2.

Something like this:

if(slot == -1) {
					// world full!
					returnCode = 7;
				} else if(handler.isPlayerOn(playerName)) {
					returnCode = 5;
				} else {

That would be my best bet.

Read full topic
